item.g:description:
Unleash your style with a modern twist. This loose, long turtleneck sweater redefines comfort and elegance. Featuring unique, artistic cutouts, it adds a bold and contemporary edge to a classic design. Its relaxed fit offers effortless movement, while the high neckline brings a touch of sophistication. Perfect for layering or wearing as a statement piece, this sweater is a go-to for women seeking versatile and chic wardrobe staples.
Material: Acrylic
